list.abs: They are over thirty but still childless ., 他们已年过三十 , 但还没有孩子.
rule of thumb , economists reckon that a family with one child needs 30 % more income than a childless couple to maintain the same living standard .根据经验，经济学家推测，有一个孩子的家庭要维持与没有孩子的夫妻同样的生活水准，需要30%的额外收入。

motherhood , not sexism , is the issue : in America , childless women earn almost as much as men , but mothers earn significantly less .这方面的问题不在于男性至上主义，而是女性的母亲身份使然：在美国，无子女的女性收入与男性相差无几，但有子女者赚的则少得多。
